hero.title: We engineer custom broadcast & IT infrastructure across East Africa.
hero.subtitle: From first signal to final viewer, we design, build and support end-to-end solutions for TV, Radio, streaming and networks — tuned for the realities of our region.

company.lede: AD Broadcast & I.T Solutions (U) Ltd is a specialist systems integrator focused on TV & Radio broadcasting, streaming platforms, ISP backbones and enterprise IT infrastructure.
body: Our team has been behind the setup, upgrade or support of many of the television and radio stations you see on air in Uganda and the region. We understand how to take a project from a blank room to a fully functional studio, play-out and transmission chain that is stable, redundant and easy to maintain.

Beyond on-air systems, we design and deploy IP networks, storage and content delivery architectures that connect studios, OB units, data centres and last-mile WiFi. Every solution is tailored — we do not drop in generic kits. We analyse the workflow, existing infrastructure, budget and long-term growth, then design something that fits.

We work closely with broadcasters, churches, government entities, NGOs and private enterprises to bridge the gap between traditional broadcast and modern IP-based delivery, including SRT, HLS, IPTV/OTT and hybrid satellite + terrestrial models.

pillars.title: Tailored engineering
pillars.description: Every project is treated as unique — from a single church stream to multi-site TV networks. We design around your workflow, budgets and growth plans.

pillars.title: Broadcast-grade reliability
pillars.description: We design for uptime: redundancy, monitoring, clear documentation and realistic SLAs so your team is not left guessing when something goes wrong.

pillars.title: End-to-end thinking
pillars.description: Studios, links, contribution, distribution, CDN and last-mile WiFi — we understand the whole chain and make sure each part works together.

experience.detail: Involved in the setup, consultancy or upgrade of multiple TV and Radio stations — from first camera and mixer choice to final transmission and streams.
Design of solutions that merge DVB, satellite, SRT, HLS and WiFi so content reaches viewers reliably on both traditional and digital platforms.
Support for projects that span multiple cities and countries, with centralised monitoring, NOC-style dashboards and documented failover paths.
